reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: If you are looking for a relaxing place to just stay for the sun & sea, Sunset beach resort is a nice place. Its only less than 20 mins away from the airport and walking distance to Pantai Cenang beach where most of the restaurants and stores are.
reviews.title: Nice environment and good service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The beach is clean, the resort itself is clean as well though we were armed with mosquitoes coil as well.
reviews.title: Good value - liked the Indonesian styling

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staffs are friendly and helpful, they help us locate a car rental so that we can roam around the island.
reviews.title: The best resort in Langkawi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Each unit houses two rooms but you will hardly notice that the other room travellers. All units are surrounded by lots of greeneries! Nicely done.
reviews.title: Excellent resort at a resaonable price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: A bit of communication problem with the server at the breakfast corner.... as my little boy dont like to eat eggs, I was trying to ask for more sausages.... their buffet only comprise of fruits, bread, cereals and hot drinks. either omelette, scrambled & fried eggs with half a sausage is served by order as they cook in the kitchen...
reviews.title: Double standard treatment by staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Researching before I left, I was looking for value, charm, a beach, and an inclusive breakfast. Tripadvisor had plenty of reviews from satisfied customers – but were they accurate?
reviews.title: Excellent little resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This small resort and front office is run by smiling friendly English speaking Malay women, Mas, Ela, Sarah, and Ida. They called us by name, and made us feel really welcome, also helping with booking day trips. Rooms were quiet and pleasant too .
reviews.title: Like a quaint boutique hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was good, with fresh fruit and cereal, noodles, eggs, toast and jam, with a view a lovely white sandy beach and little palmed islands.
reviews.title: Great beach hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also found nearby a car to rent at 50M$ per day, and petrol in Malaysia cheap at about 2M$ a litre, less than a USD.
reviews.title: Nice private beach!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We booked sunset after reading the many positive reviews from the travellers. It's like what they state. Upon arrival we were given an upgrade to the sunset 2 (good start to our trip!). The reception ladies, Mas and Ally were helpful in their advice for our dive trips. The rooms were freshly clean everyday when we came back and staff were friendly with smiles and greetings. The beach located by the resort was MUCH nicer than the area after the resort (there are rocks/trees separating our beach and the other stretch which was filthy). It's very closely situated along the main road, with a Happy Mart (convenience store) 3minutes away where we rent our motorbikes (be careful about the hot engine, I got a nasty burn on my thigh). The Thai food next to Happy Mart has delicious TomYam. Avoid the Irish bar Bernie's Place, their alcohol charges are almost twice compared to everywhere else.
reviews.title: Nice place, maybe resort is overstating the sort of hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 7 nights and spent 2 nights in the Sunset 1 room and 5 nights in the Sunset 3 room. Both rooms were fine, functional. Good for the price at Chinese New Year which was an expensive time to be on the island. The breakfast is very basic, toast, juice, some fruit, 2 types of corn flakes and they will also do you scrambled / friend eggs or an omelet which was ok. One thing that they could improve on is the cleaning of the rooms. Being right on the beach, by the end of the day there is sand in the room and when it was cleaned everyday, there was still sand on the floors and in the sheets. Apart from that, it is a good place to stay with helpful and cheerful staff.
reviews.title: Good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just came back from Langkawi and I had the most pleasant stay at the Sunset Beach Resort, Cenang Beach, Langkawi. Stayed there for 3 nights although I would have wished to have stayed there the whole duration I was in Langkawi but they were fully booked.
reviews.title: The place to stay in Cenang Beach, Langkawi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check-in was a breeze and friendly. However, do not expect concierge or a porter to help you with your luggage, but that did not bother me as it is essentially a budget-basic resort. The layout of the resort was very nice, and homely with lots of plants and trees. It instantly gave a soothing feeling of being in paradise.
reviews.title: Home from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was very clean. The bed was quite comfortable and the fridge (which is one of the most important thing in Langkawi for all you drinkers to keep the beer and wine chilled!!) was working very well. Could easily keep about 3-4 bottles of wine chilled all the time and it made ice too!! Do not expect to watch anything entertaining on TV as it only has 3 channels on it. The aircond (important especially on hot days) was working very well and kept the room cool especially in the afternoon.
reviews.title: A cosy experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom was well laid out with the basic hot water shower and only cold water (or hot water during the afternoon) wash basin. Important thing, the bathroom and toilet was very clean.
reviews.title: Glad I chose here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011
reviews.text: The breakfast next to the beach in the glass room is a heavenly experience and I absolutely would love to go again !! Architecture is great and the staff is really friendly ... Surely an amazing deal if yOu find a room :)
reviews.title: Great Place to stay at

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Comfortable chalet in lush greenery. Nice beach with sunchairs. Good value for money. Located in a peaceful spot, but it's still near to the wide choice of restaurants and bars at Pantai Cenang.
reviews.title: Cosy and worth the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice bungalows and semi-detached houses in a tropical garden by the beach. Sunbeds under the coconut trees make this location best in the whole area. The service was extremely friendly and the room was spacious. The veranda might have a touch of a carpenter in minor details though.
reviews.title: Nice stay and best location on the beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: There is not a bar in a hotel, but you can take your own drinks to the beach (plenty of shops nearby) or pop to the beach bar nextdoor.
reviews.title: Super stay Sunset

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011
reviews.text: Had lovely stay Sunset Beach Resort - peaceful, low key - everything wanted.
reviews.title: Nice baliness concept type of resort but...
